meanings.sent1: She carefully reweaved the torn fabric to fix it.
meanings.sent2: The tailor reweaves the cloth to mend the hole.
meanings.sent3: The spider was reweaving its web after it got damaged.
meanings.sent4: He felt like reweaving the threads of his life to start fresh.
meanings.sent5: The artist reweaved the colors in the painting to make it more vibrant.

meanings.definition: The act of repairing or restoring a woven fabric by weaving in new material.
meanings.sent1: The reweaving of the tapestry made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of reweaving to fix old rugs.
meanings.sent3: The reweaving of the blanket made it warmer and cozier.
meanings.sent4: The reweaving of the basket added strength to its structure.
meanings.sent5: The reweaving of the scarf added a pop of color to it.
